tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: It's beautiful... But what's the point?

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: It's not like I can stop being a criminal now. If anything, getting up here has made it harder!

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: It's a dead end up here. There's no where to run to, nowhere to hide.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text:
...........
...No, this isn't the end. Maybe I can't run, or hide. But I can fight.
